author: larryi
msg: Add showStackTraces attribute to the ContextManager to control the
display of stack traces in the default response for exceptions.
Added showStackTraces="true" to ContextManager in server.xml to
help show that this feature is present and on by default.
Added a space after the colons in the resource text strings used in
the exception response.  When stack traces are disabled, the
exception message will follow the colon on the same line.

author: larryi
msg: Restore the stack traces to ExceptionHandler().  Inclusion/exclusion via
a configuration setting is the appropriate solution.

author: larryi
msg: Removing.  This isn't the appropriate solution for the "show stack traces"

author: larryi
msg: Fix checkResponse() to return false if responseMatch doesn't match.

author: larryi
msg: Fix checkResponse() to return false if responseMatch doesn't match.
